game_description: Embark on a new mindbending adventure in Another Fisherman's Tale, the sequel to the award-winning A Fisherman's Tale. Immerse yourself in poetic storytelling as you explore new mindbending VR puzzle mechanics. Solve puzzles using your own body, detach and control your limbs, and find new attachments to progress. Discover the truth as you journey through beautiful and unique locations, brought to life by the makers of A Fisherman's Tale. Get ready for a captivating VR experience unlike any other. - Poetic Story: Search for the truth about Bob’s past by unraveling Nina’s childhood and follow Bob’s past. - Mindbending VR-Puzzle mechanics: Your own body is the primary puzzle to be solved; creating unconventional gameplay based on dismantling and reinventing of your own self. - From the makers of A Fisherman's Tale: An all new colorful and mind bending adventure by Innerspace. - More locations: Explore various immersive models, located in the basement of Nina's mother's house.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), French (France), Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: What an amazing title! Played the first one, “A fisherman’s tale”, it was original, concept and all but didn’t wow me, a little repetitive gameplay. Came to the second and… oh my! What a fantastic experience. The story, the puzzles, the gameplay, originality, voice acting, the scenarios. I teared up at the end, not gonna lie. Incredible, challenging. 10/10
review_2: I loved A fisherman's tale. Although I think I prefer the originality of the latter's gameplay, I must say Another fisherman's tale is just a fantastic game. Beautiful graphics, engaging puzzles, but most of all what a great adventure ! AFT has proven able to surprise me and amaze me as moved from one chapter to the next, particularly when it took me underwater. Big up to the designers !
review_3: What can I say that hasn't already been said about this game? A genuine masterpiece of storytelling, filled to the brim with vibrant visuals, engaging characters and an unsurpassed charm, that is so endearing, I want to forget it all and experience it all over again for the first time. Made me smile, made me cry... 10 out of 10 must play game!
review_4: I’m a 40+ female who would not be considered a gamer by any standard. That said - I love this game. It has a rich story, beautiful graphics and challenging-but-not-impossible tasks to advance. I thought A Fisherman’s Take was charming and thought there would be some degrading of the experience with the sequel. I was wrong. Another Fisherman’s Tale brings the story of Bob the Fisherman full circle in a satisfying and fun way. Total play time was between 6 and 7 hours. But I enjoyed every moment.
review_5: Beautiful/touching narrative with beautiful graphics, great puzzles and gameplay! Worth full price! Or get it cheaper (the comma is a dot, caps matter, and remove spaces): b i t , l y / A F T F r i e n d
